backend/main.mo: Motor actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, CTR registration mappings, and admin-managed canister CRUD APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing Scan & Earn feature requirements, affected files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing their UI, hooks, and utility behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/ic-config.json: IC deployment configuration specifying backend canister ID and host for frontend runtime.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the Scan & Earn app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating section navigation, CTR connection state syncing, and feature section rendering.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/AddFun: UPI payment modal allowing users to copy UPI ID, launch UPI apps, and submit transaction IDs for adding funds.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CoinCo: Displays animated coin balance using count-up animation and balance data from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CtrCon: Component for validating and connecting a CTR ID with access code, handling errors and updating connection state.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Hero.t: Landing hero section displaying headline, coin counter, and scan action button.
Re-exports all scan-earn components from a single entry point.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Reward: Displays reward tiers and allows users to select an INR-to-coins tier, showing the chosen reward summary.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/ScanRe: UI for requesting a WhatsApp NFC code, validating CTR connection before redirecting the user.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Wallet: Wallet dashboard for managing bank account details, adding funds, and accessing withdrawal tools.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Withdr: Panel for initiating withdrawals with preset amounts, requiring a linked bank account and handling request feedback.
frontend/src/config/icEnv.ts: Loads and manages Internet Computer environment config, choosing between local defaults and deployed settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUp.ts: Animates a number smoothly up to a target value using an ease‑out function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, loading, login, and logout via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user connection, balances, bank data, and reward tiers with placeholder backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Helpers for formatting INR values, coin counts, and validating 7‑digit CTR IDs.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/state/flowStore.ts: Zustand store managing CTR connection state and selected reward tier.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links and provides a preset link for NFC code requests.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color palette using CSS variables, extended shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes. Includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing CTR validation features, WhatsApp scan flow requirements, and existing/new feature requests. Captures architectural notes, versions, and issue tracking details.
